questions.question: How should you enter a Zoom Class?

choices.answer: Come in like a wrecking ball
Enter as loudly as you possibly can
Just skip it Zoom Class isn't important anyway
Make sure you are in a quiet area, your name is on the screen, be on time.

questions.question: How do I get my teachers attention during Zoom Class?

choices.answer: Click the hand buttom on the zoom screen or post your question in the chat
Yell your teachers name until she answers you
Say "Ms" over and over again
Just scream bloody murder

questions.question: How do we ask to go to the bathrrom during Zoom Class?

choices.answer: Yell "I gotta pee" and run away
Take your computer in the bathroom with you so you don't miss anything
Mute your computer and turn off your camera and go as needed.
Hold it.

questions.question: How should I act in a Zoom Class?

choices.answer: No one gets to talk but me.
My learning is the only learning that matters...so I will distract everyone
Be respectful, appropriate, and courteous.
Send innapropiate chats and messages because they are funny

questions.question: What do you do if you are absent?

choices.answer: Just take the zero....it won't effect my grade
Email my teacher or request a zoom meeting to catch up.
Copy a friends work
Oh well...

questions.question: What do I do is Ms. Ballee is directly teaching?

choices.answer: Pay attention, add to discussion, ask questions, be respectful
Dont pay attention...what she is saying isn't important.
Talk to my friends...I havn't seen them in forever
Mute my microphone and play video games/watch youtube.

questions.question: Can we use our phones during Zoom Class?

choices.answer: Please refrain from using your phone, unless it is an emergency
Just mute your teacher...my phone is more important
yes
heck yes

questions.question: Your sibling is talking to you and you are in zoom class you should unmute you mic so we can hear it.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: You are in zoom class and you have to go to the bathroom, make sure your mic in unmuted

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: I am bored during zoom class so I should start playing video games, my teacher won't notice...

choices.answer: True
False
